com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.importer

Class ExcelUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.importer.ExcelUtilities

  • public final class ExcelUtilities
extends Object
    Utilities class for dealing with Excel workbooks in Java. Uses the apache POI library.
